item.title: Elvis Presley - The Wonder Of You
item.description:
When no one else
can understand me
When everything
I do is wrong
You give me hope
and consolation
You give me
strength to carry on
And you’re always
there to lend
A hand

That’s the wonder

And when you smile

and I’m a king
Your love for me

I’ll never know
The reason why
you love me
Like you do
that’s the wonder
The wonder of you
oh- oh- oh-
I’ll guess

you love me like

that’s the wonder

of you-
